text.value: Is the burn severity similar within a 30 m radius?
Includes leaves that have fallen after the burn but not unburned patches
Approximate the percentage of area not burned.
Broken leaf pieces that form a type of mulch under the litter layer. If necessary, scrape down to mineral soil to see how deeply the char has penetrated.
Logs greater than 6 mm diameter that were on the ground prior to the burn.
Show a representative part of this stratum

Can walk thrhough, some brushes, widest gap less than 1.5m
All green growth associated at the base of shrubs or apparently out in the open. Include seedlings in the approximate area.
